messages.subject: Re: The magic of mentos
messages.msgSnippet: ... One tip from my aunt (who told us about their trials with different brand, etc.)- Use DIET.. it won t get everything all sticky since there isn t sugar in
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> KATHRYN!!! You must have ESP woman.;)
>
> Two days ago, the kids that were all up at Kelly's for the pool party
> got all into the whole Mentos/Coke discussion.

One tip from my aunt (who told us about their trials with different
brand, etc.)-
Use DIET.. it won't get everything all sticky since there isn't sugar
in it :)

Kiersten

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The magic of mentos
messages.msgSnippet: It must be one of those days, independently each of the boys came up and asked for cuts, ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Yep, that just happened at our house
messages.messageBody:
It must be one of those days, independently each of the boys came up
and asked for cuts,

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Yep, that just happened at our house recently, too! Stone (4.75) asked for a mohawk, so we got out the clippers and headed to the front porch. Then baby Sage decided he wanted to crawl up into the chair, then motioned for the cape, then the clippers (communicating darn well without using any words yet!) So, I followed his lead and gave him a little buzz (did leave some long on top, just couldn't part with the baby hair quite yet-it's kind of groovy, funky cool though! :)
Then big brother decided he was up for a cut, too!
Fun!
Karen
http://www.thewildtribe.blogspot.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
It must be one of those days, independently each of the boys came up
and asked for cuts, Sam's got a mohawk, Dan has a mimsy (what we call
short all over with bangs), Josh is more boring he NEVER wants
anything new. Breanna got hers shaved underneath the top mop.
Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo.com/multimomma

messages.subject: The magic of mentos
messages.msgSnippet: KATHRYN!!! You must have ESP woman.;) Two days ago, the kids that were all up at Kelly s for the pool party got all into the whole Mentos/Coke discussion.
messages.messageBody:
KATHRYN!!! You must have ESP woman.;)

Two days ago, the kids that were all up at Kelly's for the pool party
got all into the whole Mentos/Coke discussion. Arielle decided she was
going to drink Coke and swallow a Mentos. Trevor was having a fit
because he was worried about her safety.

They got onto Kelly's computer and looked up all kinds of videos
showing explosions.

Cool videos! They didn't find those, so we have more Mentos/Coke stuff
to look at now. Thanks.

Trevor has a mohawk now and Arielle totally shaved her head. If only
we'd had some Mentos and Coke to experiment with...they wouldn't have
gone after Kelly's dog grooming shears instead!!!:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
